sentences.en: A little asbestos fiber is formed on the contacts.
sentences.cn: 有少量石棉产于接触带.

sentences.en: Air-entraining agent increases impermeability of hybrid fiber concrete.
sentences.cn: 引气剂有助于提高混杂纤维混凝土的抗渗性。

sentences.en: And remember nuts like almonds with their skins on have more fiber than those without.
sentences.cn: 记住，向杏仁那样有皮的坚果比那些没有皮的更富含纤维素。

sentences.en: But with fiber - optic cables, television will become truly interactive.
sentences.cn: 但是,有了光纤电缆, 电视就可以真正成为交互式的.

sentences.en: Coconuts provide " meat ", drink, oil, soap and fiber for fishing line.
sentences.cn: 椰子提供 “ 肉类 ”, 饮料 、 油脂 、 肥皂和做钓(鱼)丝的纤维.

sentences.en: Eating cereals and fruit will give you plenty of fiber in your diet.
sentences.cn: 吃谷类食物和水果能多摄取纤维质.

sentences.en: Fiber optics have even been adopted by novelty makers for table decorations.
sentences.cn: 纤维光学甚至被一些喜欢制作新奇事物的人用作桌子的装饰.

sentences.en: Fiber reactive dyes - from true chemical bounds between dyestuff and fiber.
sentences.cn: 纤维活性染料 -- 染料与纤维之间形成真正的化学键.

sentences.en: Not only do they offer antioxidants, they contain higher content of vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
sentences.cn: 它们不仅提供抗氧化剂，还含有较高含量的维生素、矿物质和纤维。

sentences.en: Rayon rank second only to cotton as the most widely used fiber.
sentences.cn: 人造丝是仅次于棉花的使用得最广泛的织物。

sentences.en: Reporter: Why do you have to control your own fiber to connect the data centers?
sentences.cn: 记者：为什么你们必须要控制自己的光纤来连接你们的数据中心呢？

sentences.en: Such extraction modifies the whole cell - membrance network throughout the wool fiber.
sentences.cn: 这种萃取改变了整个毛纤维中所有细胞膜的网状结构.

sentences.en: The muscle fiber of this animal is diseased.
sentences.cn: 这个动物的肌肉纤维产生了病变.

sentences.en: The rod is then heated and pulled like taffy into a fiber.
sentences.cn: 然后将这根棒加热并像太妃糖一样被拉成一根纤维.

sentences.en: The wall consists of an array of fiber - glass cylinders filled with water.
sentences.cn: 这种墙由一排装有水的玻璃纤维圆筒组成.

sentences.en: These foods should contain some fat, some fiber, a little salt and so on.
sentences.cn: 这些食物应该含有一些脂肪、纤维，还应该有一点盐等等。

sentences.en: These forces may cause fiber slippage within the yarn structure.
sentences.cn: 这些力会引起纱线结构内部纤维的滑脱.

sentences.en: Viswanathan has analyzed the frictional interaction between fiber fringes.
sentences.cn: 维斯沃纳森分析了纤维须头间的相互摩擦作用.

sentences.en: When the fibers broke, fiber ends were mangled and frayed.
sentences.cn: 纤维断裂时, 纤维端部相互纠缠并有擦散现象.

sentences.en: While they bite into the fruit, they could savor the various blends of fiber and juices.
sentences.cn: 当他们咬一口水果，他们可以尝到各种水果纤维和汁液的混合。
